title: Swain Rework
body: As a Swain main this rework pisses me off. He was just fine before. This demonic bullshit is not needed he was all about ravens now he got a demon hand the fuck.

replies.body: I've seen a lot of passionate people about the Swain rework, mostly due to how his overall look changed a bit. I can't honestly decide if I like this more or not, but you should definitely post this over in [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) or [**Story/Art/Sound**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art) to get more attention and players commenting. It likely won't get as many views over here though.

A BIT?

he pass of be a misteryous man with a crow in his shoulder and a cane and a lame walk style to be a Vladimir older version without hand. and you become him in some kind of wise expert warrior on his story instead of an ingenous survivor of thousand battles -.-
